projects.name: River Management Chatbot
projects.description: Team project for the SIH 2025 Hackathon  Designing a chatbot to strengthen the rivers people using AI  Engineering a robot mascot to reduce pollution level and increases awareness about cleaning rivers.

projects.name: Building Bus Reservation System
projects.description: Developed a full-stack web application for providing easy access to the users for reserving the bus  Implemented a website for booking bus tickets online and get prepaid and postpaid facilities  Collaborated with users to get feedback and suggested features.

projects.name: Music Recommendation System
projects.description: Developed a ML model to suggest the music to the users considering their interests and history  Used persistent data through which the model is tested by K- means clustering algorithm  Implemented a model to provide best best music experience to the users.

experiences.description: Instructed and trained over 100 college juniors in Machine Learning Algorithms as a dedicated instructor. Utilized interactive teaching methods to simplify complex ML topics, creating a dynamic learning atmosphere for juniors.
Learned to develop an app to get easy access of educational portals.
Established functions and networks to private, public and hybrid cloud infrastructures.
